class_widget.php File Reference

Data Structures

class  widget
 class widget This class is used to create all the HTML INPUT TYPE and some specials which works with javascript like js_search. special value js_search and js_search_only :you need to add a span widget the name of the js_* widget + '_label' , the member extra contains cred,deb to filter the search of cred of deb of a jrn or contains a string with a list of frd_id. Possible type $type
  • TEXT
  • HIDDEN
  • SELECT
  • PASSWORD
  • CHECKBOX
  • RADIO
  • TEXTAREA
  • RICHTEXT
  • FILE
  • JS_SEARCH_POSTE call a popup window for searching the account
  • JS_SEARCH call a popup window for searching a quickcode or to add one
  • JS_SEARCH_ONLY like JS_SEARCH but without adding a quickcode
  • SPAN
  • JS_TVA open a popup window for the VAT
  • JS_CONCERNED open a popup window for search a operation
More...

Detailed Description
